com.google.android.exoplayer

Class CryptoInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.CryptoInfo

  • public class CryptoInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Compatibility wrapper around android.media.MediaCodec.CryptoInfo.

      • setFromExtractorV16

        public void setFromExtractorV16(MediaExtractor extractor)
        Equivalent to MediaExtractor#getSampleCryptoInfo(android.media.MediaCodec.CryptoInfo).
        Parameters:
        extractor - The extractor from which to retrieve the crypto information.

      • getFrameworkCryptoInfoV16

        public android.media.MediaCodec.CryptoInfo getFrameworkCryptoInfoV16()
        Returns an equivalent android.media.MediaCodec.CryptoInfo instance.

        Successive calls to this method on a single CryptoInfo will return the same instance. Changes to the CryptoInfo will be reflected in the returned object. The return object should not be modified directly.

        Returns:
        The equivalent android.media.MediaCodec.CryptoInfo instance.
